testcase.classname: Verify Xealei Suites > Add Suites Page
testcase.name: To verify the buttons functionality and error validation and info messages in Add Suite Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password................passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed And User should verify the Suite Module is working..........................passed Then User should verify suite page tab url address for suites page..........passed Then User should verify the Add Suite button is working.....................passed Then User should verify the Add Suite pop up screen is displayed............passed Then User should verify the limit error info message for Suite Name* field "Suite Name must be minimum 3 characters".passed Then User should verify the field Suite Name * is mandatory "Please Enter Suite Name".passed And User should create a suite and verify duplicate validation for Suite name '"Suite Name already exists."'.passed And User should perform only non-mandatory fields...........................passed Then User should verify the error message contains for Mandatory fields "Please Enter Suite Name".passed Then User should perform Add Suite without enter any fields.................passed Then User should verify the error message contains for Mandatory fields "Please Enter Suite Name".passed Then User should verify the x icon in add suites screen is working..........passed
